name: Oni in Spring Onion's Shape
description:
3 person team project, for Firith Studio's Great Spring Jam. We've faced some hurdles on the way but it was a nice run.

I do not know how to fix the audio for the html5 version so here's a windows version.

Also I have no way to check if a Mac version works so uhhhhhhhhhhhhh lol rip I guess.
